typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (function (uint256,uint256,address) payable external returns (uint256))

params.oTokenAddress: The address of the oToken to buy
params.oTokensToBuy: The number of oTokens to buy
params.paymentTokenAddress: The address of the token to pay the premiums in
params.receiver: The address to send the oTokens back to

params.oTokenAddress: The address of the oToken to sell
params.oTokensToSell: The number of oTokens to sell
params.payoutTokenAddress: The address of the token to receive the premiums in

params.oTokenAddress: The address of the oToken to buy
params.oTokensToBuy: The number of oTokens to buy
params.paymentTokenAddress: The address of the token to pay the premiums in

params.oTokenAddress: The address of the oToken to sell
params.oTokensToSell: The number of oTokens to sell
params.payoutTokenAddress: The address of the token to receive the premiums in
params.receiver: The address to send the payout tokens back to

buyOTokens(address,address,address,uint2.notice: This function buys oTokens on Uniswap and using paymentTokens from the receiver

premiumReceived(address,address,uint256).notice: This function calculates the amount of premiums that the seller will receive if they sold oTokens on Uniswap

premiumToPay(address,address,uint256).notice: This function calculates the premiums to be paid if a buyer wants to buy oTokens on Uniswap

sellOTokens(address,address,address,uint.notice: This function sells oTokens on Uniswap and sends back payoutTokens to the receiver
